---
title: "{{title}}"
subtitle: "{{subtitle}}"
author: "{{author}}"
date: "{{date}}"
format:
  pdf:
    documentclass: article
    papersize: a4
    fontsize: 16pt
    geometry:
      - top=48pt
      - bottom=48pt
      - left=48pt
      - right=48pt
    include-in-header:
      text: |
        \usepackage{fontspec}
        \usepackage{xcolor}
        \usepackage{fancyhdr}
        \usepackage{graphicx}
        \usepackage{tcolorbox}
        \usepackage{listings}
        \usepackage{sectsty}
        \usepackage{titling}
        \usepackage{parskip}
        \usepackage{enumitem}
        \usepackage{booktabs}
        \usepackage{array}
        \usepackage{multicol}
        \usepackage{calc}

        % ============================================
        % IBM PLEX FONT FAMILY
        % ============================================

        \IfFontExistsTF{IBM Plex Sans}{
          \setmainfont{IBM Plex Sans}[
            UprightFont = *-Regular,
            BoldFont = *-SemiBold,
            ItalicFont = *-Italic,
            BoldItalicFont = *-SemiBoldItalic
          ]
        }{
          \setmainfont{Liberation Sans}
        }

        \IfFontExistsTF{IBM Plex Mono}{
          \setmonofont{IBM Plex Mono}[
            UprightFont = *-Regular,
            BoldFont = *-SemiBold
          ]
        }{
          \setmonofont{Liberation Mono}
        }

        % ============================================
        % CARBON COLORS
        % ============================================

        \definecolor{blue60}{HTML}{0f62fe}
        \definecolor{gray10}{HTML}{f4f4f4}
        \definecolor{gray20}{HTML}{e0e0e0}
        \definecolor{gray30}{HTML}{c6c6c6}
        \definecolor{gray50}{HTML}{8d8d8d}
        \definecolor{gray70}{HTML}{525252}
        \definecolor{gray100}{HTML}{161616}
        \definecolor{green50}{HTML}{24a148}
        \definecolor{green10}{HTML}{defbe6}
        \definecolor{red60}{HTML}{da1e28}
        \definecolor{red10}{HTML}{fff1f1}
        \definecolor{yellow30}{HTML}{f1c21b}
        \definecolor{yellow10}{HTML}{fcf4d6}
        \definecolor{blue10}{HTML}{edf5ff}
        \definecolor{purple60}{HTML}{8a3ffc}

        % Theme tokens
        \colorlet{themeBackground}{white}
        \colorlet{themeLayer01}{gray10}
        \colorlet{themeBorderSubtle}{gray20}
        \colorlet{themeTextPrimary}{gray100}
        \colorlet{themeTextSecondary}{gray70}
        \colorlet{themeLinkPrimary}{blue60}
        \colorlet{themeInteractive}{blue60}

        % ============================================
        % SPACING TOKENS (8px base unit)
        % ============================================

        \newlength{\spOne}
        \newlength{\spTwo}
        \newlength{\spThree}
        \newlength{\spFour}
        \newlength{\spFive}
        \newlength{\spSix}
        \newlength{\spSeven}
        \newlength{\spEight}
        \newlength{\spNine}
        \newlength{\spTen}
        \newlength{\spEleven}
        \newlength{\spTwelve}
        \newlength{\spThirteen}

        \setlength{\spOne}{2pt}      % 2px
        \setlength{\spTwo}{4pt}      % 4px
        \setlength{\spThree}{8pt}    % 8px - Base unit
        \setlength{\spFour}{12pt}    % 12px
        \setlength{\spFive}{16pt}    % 16px
        \setlength{\spSix}{24pt}     % 24px
        \setlength{\spSeven}{32pt}   % 32px
        \setlength{\spEight}{40pt}   % 40px
        \setlength{\spNine}{48pt}    % 48px
        \setlength{\spTen}{64pt}     % 64px
        \setlength{\spEleven}{80pt}  % 80px
        \setlength{\spTwelve}{96pt}  % 96px
        \setlength{\spThirteen}{160pt} % 160px

        % ============================================
        % GRID CONFIGURATION
        % ============================================

        \newlength{\gridGutter}
        \newlength{\gridMargin}
        \setlength{\gridGutter}{\spSeven}  % 32px
        \setlength{\gridMargin}{\spFive}   % 16px

        % ============================================
        % LAYOUT COMPONENTS
        % ============================================

        % Card component
        \newtcolorbox{carboncard}[1][]{
          colback=themeLayer01,
          colframe=themeBorderSubtle,
          arc=4pt,
          boxsep=\spFive,
          left=\spFive,
          right=\spFive,
          top=\spFour,
          bottom=\spFour,
          #1
        }

        % Info box (blue)
        \newtcolorbox{carboninfo}{
          colback=blue10,
          colframe=blue60,
          leftrule=4pt,
          rightrule=0pt,
          toprule=0pt,
          bottomrule=0pt,
          arc=4pt,
          boxsep=\spFive,
          left=\spFive,
          right=\spFive,
          top=\spFour,
          bottom=\spFour
        }

        % Warning box (yellow)
        \newtcolorbox{carbonwarning}{
          colback=yellow10,
          colframe=yellow30,
          leftrule=4pt,
          rightrule=0pt,
          toprule=0pt,
          bottomrule=0pt,
          arc=4pt,
          boxsep=\spFive,
          left=\spFive,
          right=\spFive,
          top=\spFour,
          bottom=\spFour
        }

        % Error box (red)
        \newtcolorbox{carbonerror}{
          colback=red10,
          colframe=red60,
          leftrule=4pt,
          rightrule=0pt,
          toprule=0pt,
          bottomrule=0pt,
          arc=4pt,
          boxsep=\spFive,
          left=\spFive,
          right=\spFive,
          top=\spFour,
          bottom=\spFour
        }

        % Success box (green)
        \newtcolorbox{carbonsuccess}{
          colback=green10,
          colframe=green50,
          leftrule=4pt,
          rightrule=0pt,
          toprule=0pt,
          bottomrule=0pt,
          arc=4pt,
          boxsep=\spFive,
          left=\spFive,
          right=\spFive,
          top=\spFour,
          bottom=\spFour
        }

        % ============================================
        % TYPOGRAPHY SCALE
        % ============================================

        \setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
        \setlength{\parskip}{0.5em}
        \linespread{1.5}

        % Heading 1 → Heading 06 (42pt)
        \sectionfont{%
          \color{themeTextPrimary}%
          \fontsize{42}{50}\selectfont%
          \fontseries{l}\selectfont%
        }

        % Heading 2 → Heading 05 (32pt)
        \subsectionfont{%
          \color{themeTextPrimary}%
          \fontsize{32}{40}\selectfont%
          \fontseries{m}\selectfont%
        }

        % Heading 3 → Heading 04 (28pt)
        \subsubsectionfont{%
          \color{themeTextPrimary}%
          \fontsize{28}{36}\selectfont%
          \fontseries{m}\selectfont%
        }

        % ============================================
        % HEADER AND FOOTER
        % ============================================

        \pagestyle{fancy}
        \fancyhf{}

        \fancyhead[L]{%
          \color{themeTextSecondary}%
          \fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont%
          \textit{ {{title}} }%
        }

        \fancyfoot[L]{%
          \color{themeTextSecondary}%
          \fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont%
          {{author}}%
        }
        \fancyfoot[C]{%
          \color{themeTextSecondary}%
          \fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont%
          \thepage%
        }
        \fancyfoot[R]{%
          \color{themeTextSecondary}%
          \fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont%
          {{date}}%
        }

        \renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.5pt}
        \renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.5pt}
        \renewcommand{\headrule}{%
          \hbox to\headwidth{%
            \color{themeBorderSubtle}\leaders\hrule height \headrulewidth\hfill%
          }%
        }
        \renewcommand{\footrule}{%
          \hbox to\headwidth{%
            \color{themeBorderSubtle}\leaders\hrule height \footrulewidth\hfill%
          }%
        }

        % ============================================
        % CODE BLOCKS
        % ============================================

        \lstset{
          basicstyle=\fontsize{14}{20}\ttfamily\color{themeTextPrimary},
          backgroundcolor=\color{themeLayer01},
          frame=single,
          rulecolor=\color{themeBorderSubtle},
          framesep=\spFive,
          breaklines=true,
          commentstyle=\color{themeTextSecondary},
          keywordstyle=\color{purple60}\bfseries,
          stringstyle=\color{green50},
          numberstyle=\tiny\color{gray50},
          numbers=left,
          numbersep=\spFour,
          tabsize=2,
          xleftmargin=\spFive,
          xrightmargin=\spFive
        }

        % Inline code
        \let\oldtexttt\texttt
        \renewcommand{\texttt}[1]{%
          \colorbox{themeLayer01}{%
            \color{themeLinkPrimary}%
            \fontsize{12}{16}\ttfamily#1%
          }%
        }

        % ============================================
        % BLOCKQUOTES
        % ============================================

        \renewenvironment{quote}{%
          \begin{tcolorbox}[
            colback=themeLayer01,
            colframe=themeInteractive,
            leftrule=4pt,
            rightrule=0pt,
            toprule=0pt,
            bottomrule=0pt,
            arc=4pt,
            boxsep=\spFive,
            left=\spFive,
            right=\spFive,
            top=\spFour,
            bottom=\spFour
          ]%
          \itshape\color{themeTextSecondary}%
        }{%
          \end{tcolorbox}%
        }

        % ============================================
        % LISTS
        % ============================================

        \setlist[itemize]{%
          label=\textcolor{themeInteractive}{\textbullet},%
          leftmargin=1em,%
          itemsep=0.5em%
        }

        \setlist[enumerate]{%
          label=\textcolor{themeInteractive}{\arabic*.},%
          leftmargin=1em,%
          itemsep=0.5em%
        }

        % ============================================
        % HYPERLINKS
        % ============================================

        \usepackage{hyperref}
        \hypersetup{
          colorlinks=true,
          linkcolor=themeLinkPrimary,
          urlcolor=themeLinkPrimary,
          citecolor=themeLinkPrimary,
          pdfborder={0 0 0}
        }

        % ============================================
        % TITLE PAGE
        % ============================================

        \pretitle{%
          \begin{center}%
          \color{themeInteractive}\rule{\textwidth}{4pt}\par
          \vspace{32pt}%
          \color{themeTextPrimary}\fontsize{42}{50}\selectfont\fontseries{l}\selectfont
        }
        \posttitle{%
          \par\vspace{16pt}%
          \end{center}%
        }

        \preauthor{%
          \begin{center}%
          \color{themeTextPrimary}\fontsize{16}{24}\selectfont\bfseries
        }
        \postauthor{%
          \par\vspace{8pt}%
          \end{center}%
        }

        \predate{%
          \begin{center}%
          \color{themeTextSecondary}\fontsize{14}{16}\selectfont
        }
        \postdate{%
          \par\vspace{48pt}%
          \begin{tcolorbox}[
            colback=themeLayer01,
            colframe=themeBorderSubtle,
            arc=4pt,
            boxsep=12pt
          ]
          \centering\color{themeTextSecondary}\fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont
          \textit{Styled with IBM Carbon 2x Grid System}
          \end{tcolorbox}
          \end{center}%
          \vfill
        }
---

{{content}}
